About the Company: Majestic Research Services and Solutions Ltd. is engaged in providing research and development services. It offers qualitative and quantitative research services for both nationally and internationally, planning and field management for multi-phased, multi-location projects. It caters to fast moving consumer goods (FMCG), automobile, banking, financial services and insurance (BFSI), pharma, information and communications technology (ICT) and media sectors. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Mumbai, Maharashtra with an additional office in Bengaluru. Majestic Research Services and Solutions Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Majestic Market Research Support Services Ltd.
